name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: Richard Galvin's Shocking Crypto Predictions for 2025
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market is transitioning from infrastructure-focused protocols to application-driven value creation, with AI and decentralized applications (dApps) emerging as key growth areas in 2025.

Key Insights
- Crypto protocols are experiencing over-investment, with block space supply significantly exceeding current demand
- Applications layer (dApps) are showing more promising investment potential, with some projects generating substantial revenue
- Key growth areas identified:
  - AI-related crypto projects (e.g., Grass, World Coin)
  - Decentralized finance (DeFi) applications
  - Projects with token models that provide real utility and revenue sharing
- Emerging investment strategies focus on:
  - Projects trading at low multiples relative to growth
  - Applications generating significant fees
  - Projects with transparent token economics
- Notable crypto trends:
  - Solana demonstrating high transaction volumes
  - Meme token trading platforms generating significant revenue
  - Increasing regulatory clarity improving institutional confidence
- Valuation approach emphasizes:
  - Number of active users
  - Transaction value
  - Potential for token holders to receive returns
- AI and crypto convergence seen as a critical future development, with potential for data monetization and authentication solutions
